#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType FourSome.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CFourSome FourSome]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--FourSome (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			A FourSome type is used to store up to three additional player names who play the same round of golf.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...>
            player-some{0,3}  
  </...>
----
  		
=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| player-some ||  											Qualification of the player on the 2,3,4 some.					 || golfml:PlayerSome ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CRound Round]
